articles.title: Measles highest in 25 years in European region, WHO says - BBC.com
articles.description: Children under five constituted more than 40% of the cases reported in Europe and Central Asia last year.
articles.content:
The rise is attributed to increasing scepticism about immunisation
The number of measles cases in the European region doubled last year to reach the highest level in 25 years, health officials say.… [+2953 chars]

articles.title: Trump threatens 200% tariff on European alcohol as trade war escalates - CNN
articles.description: President Donald Trump on Thursday threatened to impose a massive tariff on European alcohol in response to the European Union’s retaliation against his steel and aluminum tariffs – a tit-for-tat escalation of a trade war that could easily get out of hand.

articles.title: Spain: Scientists uncover oldest face in Western Europe - DW (English)
articles.description: The facial bones of an adult nicknamed "Pink," unearthed in Spain, rewrite humankind's early history in Europe.
articles.content:
Scientists in Spain have excavated fossilized facial bones that may be from a previously unknown species of the human family.
